actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to place an additional 10 positions in the Department of Defense in Executive Level IV and Executive Level V and to prescribe the duties for such positions.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to place an additional ten civilian positions in the Department of Defense in Executive Levels IV and V and to prescribe the duties of such positions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to place an additional 10 positions in the Department of Defense in Executive Level IV and Executive Level V and to prescribe the duties for such positions.
